definition: to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: I remember when she first came to Hong Kong, my teacher was still alive.
sentences.chinese: 記得佢第一次嚟香港時，我嘅老師還健喺。

sentences.english: Even if you are being in love very appropriately, that marriage later?
sentences.chinese: 就算你喺談拍拖好合適，嗰個結婚以後呢？

sentences.english: This user lives in the state of West Virginia .
sentences.chinese: 呢位用戶目前住喺西維珍尼亞州。

sentences.english: However, we also face the reality of the need.
sentences.chinese: 但是，硪菛還喺需要面對現實的。

sentences.english: I did not respond in this with me to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 我當時都冇回覆，喺此我兼埋回答大家嘅問題。

sentences.english: Are placed next to the interview recording equipment, I know they are recording.
sentences.chinese: 採訪中則跟都放著錄音器材，我知佢哋都喺錄音。

sentences.english: On a fine saturday we went to a park.
sentences.chinese: 喺一個晴朗嘅星期六我哋去咗個公園。

sentences.chinese: 我再次感覺到搵錢唔容易，但喺用錢就啱啱相反。

sentences.chinese: 呢位用戶目前住喺猶他州。

Thought three years ago in Japan and her first meeting, vivid memories.
sentences.chinese: 想到三年前喺日本和佢嘅第一次撞面，往事歷歷喺目。

sentences.english: Thought three years ago in Japan and her first meeting, vivid memories.
sentences.chinese: 想到三年前喺日本和佢嘅第一次撞面，往事歷歷喺目。

sentences.english: The things I interest in are more than I can handle, time forbids me doing these.

definition: to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
possessive particle (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 的[de5]
he (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 他[ta1]
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
used in transliteration
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
some/few/a little (Cantonese)
correct/suitable/to suit sb/just now (Cantonese)
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
that (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 那[na4]
to confer on/to give to
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
home/family (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 家[jia1]
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
thing/matter (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
